name: TRAVELERS (Prototype)
description:
A prototype of a game that progressively and purposely loses purpose the more you play it.

You are a Traveler. Travelers are the memory of this world.

Travelers carry Spheres of History.
Shards of History can be left for future Travelers.
In each place, Travelers can leave only one Shard in their lifetime.

If they leave a place without leaving a Shard behind the memory of their passage will be lost in time.

Their Sphere survives them.

Death always leaves a Shard.

TRAVELERS is a prototype made for the Monthly Adventure Game Studio Competition, April 2019.

The game can be played either with the mouse or keyboard.
